scenario_text.value: Hey, Takuma?
Yeah, Saki? What is it?

Do you remember the first time we saw this
whole world? From the top of the TV tower?
How should I respond to Saki?
I remember it well.
Did we do that?

I remember it well. There’s no way I’d forget
something like that.

Yeah... The school and the shrine were
familiar, but the land was so different...

We could even see the ocean... I was shocked!
The whole place had become an island...

Did we do that?
Oh, now that you mention it...
Seriously?! You forgot?

What do you expect, Saki?
Takuma’s been super busy out here!

Yeah, I guess you’re right. Sorry for saying
something so weird... Forget about it!

What made you think about back then, all of
a sudden?
Yeah, Saki’s kinda out of it.

Well, I just got thinking... I wonder what’s
beyond this island?
Beyond the island?

Well, yeah! If this is an island, there must
be land somewhere else, right?
Do I think there’s land out there?
I sure do!
I can’t imagine it...

I’m sure there is! I can’t imagine this is
the only island out there.
Huh, I never took you for such a daydreamer.

A daydreamer? Are you saying you don’t think
there’s anything out there?

Well, sometimes I think so. But thinking that
way makes me kinda depressed.

Hey Floramon, do you know if there are any
lands in this world besides this one?
Hmm, no idea. I’ve never thought about it.
Ahh, all right.

Hmm, I can’t even imagine. I’ve had my hands
full dealing with this island alone...
You’ve been a busy bee, Takuma!
Yeah... You know, I kind of hope there is.
If not, it feels a little claustrophobic.

A “world” is a big, wide place, right?
If this island is the whole world...
It’s like...a scene in a snow globe.

A scene in a snow globe...
Yeah, I see what you mean.

Well, it’s no biggie. Just popped into my
head. Sorry to bother you with it.

I hope there’s more out there... If the whole
world’s just an island I swear I’ll freak.
I won’t be able to breathe, I swear.

I...never considered how oppressive that
could feel.

A “world” is a big, wide place, right?
If this is the whole world...

It’s like...a scene in a snow globe.
Don’t you think?
Is this world like a scene in a snow globe?
I see what you mean.
I don’t think so.

I can see what you mean. If this island is
the whole world here...
It’s like someone built the whole thing.

Right? RIGHT?!
You think so too?

You know, I’ve been thinking lately about the
view from that TV tower...

I figure there must be something beyond that
vast ocean...

Maybe you’re thinking this way because we’ll
be heading back to our world soon.
Yeah... Sure, that makes sense.

I don’t think so. There’s too much nature and
too many creatures to be just manufactured.

If this island makes up this whole world, it
just means that’s the kind of world this is.
You’re kind of a wet blanket, huh, Takuma?
What? Really?

Well, it’s not exactly the end of the world.
Still, next time try playing along a bit.
Uh, sure... My bad.
Aww, you poor thing!

Don’t sweat it! Come on, let’s go grab some
food!
